required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Ovarian Reserve Tests in Unexplained Infertile Women
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Ovarian Reserve Tests in Unexplained Infertile Women

brief_summary.textblock: IN UNEXPLAINED INFERTILITY IN WOMEN ,OVARY RESERVE IS BORDERLINE IF ASSESSED USING HIGH-SENSITIVE TESTS.

detailed_description.textblock:
IN UNEXPLAINED INFERTILITY OVARIAN RESERVE TESTS WERE ASSESSED.
IN THIS STUDY, A COMPARISON IS DONE BETWEEN 35 WOMEN WITH UNEXPLAINED FERTILITY(THE PATIENT) AND 35 WOMEN WHO DON'T HAVE ANY FERTILITY PROBLEMS AND HAVE AT LEAST A CHILD (THE CONTROL GROUP).
THE STUDY PARTICIPANTS SHOULD HAVE THE FOLLOWING CRITERIA
Inclusion Criteria:
LESS THAN 35 YEARS OLD, MARRIED WOMEN SHOULD HAVE REGULAR MENSES SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST A YEAR OF UNPROTECTED SEX. THE HUSBAND'S SPERMOGRAM SHOULD HAVE NO ABNORMALITIES THE SUBJECT SHOULD HAVE A NORMAL HYSTEROSALPHINGOGRAPHY
Exclusion Criteria:
HAVING ANY SYSTEMIC DISEASE. LONG HISTORY OF ANY DRUG USAGE.
FOR THE CONTROL GROUP
Inclusion Criteria:
LESS THAN 35 YEARS OLD, MARRIED WOMEN SHOULD HAVE REGULAR MENSES AT LEAST HAVE A CHILD THE HUSBAND'S SPERMOGRAM SHOULD HAVE NO ABNORMALITIES THE SUBJECT SHOULD HAVE A NORMAL HYSTEROSALPHINGOGRAPHY
Exclusion Criteria:
HAVING ANY SYSTEMIC DISEASE. LONG HISTORY OF ANY DRUG USAGE.
THE STUDY INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING TESTS BEING DONE ON THE PATIENTS:
THE FOLLOWING HORMONES' LEVELS WERE STUDIED:AMH (ANTI-MULLERIAN HORMONE),FSH (FOLLICULAR STIMULATING HORMONE) , E2 (ESTRADIOL) AND INHIBIN B.THE FORMER THREE HORMONE LEVELS SHOULD BE ASSESSED ON THE THIRD DAY OF MENSES IN THE STUDY,TRANSVAGINAL ULTRASONOGRAPHIC OVARIAN VOLUME ,OVARIAN ANTRAL FOLLICULE NUMBER,OVARIAN STROMAL BLOODFLOW AND OVARIAN ARTERIAL RESISTANCE WAS MEASURED USING DOPPLER ULTRASONOGRAM.

primary_outcome.measure: LEVELS OF OVARIAN RESERVE MARKERS IN THE SERUM
primary_outcome.description: AMH (ANTI-MULLERIAN HORMONE),FSH (FOLLICLE STIMULATING HORMONE),E2 (ESTRADIOL)AND INHIBIN -B LEVELS WILL BE TESTED

secondary_outcome.measure: ULTRASONOGRAPHIC ASSESSMENT OF OVARIAN RESERVE MARKERS
secondary_outcome.description: OVARIAN ANTRAL FOLLICULE COUNT ,OVARIAN VOLUME MEASUREMENT,OVARIAN DOPPLER -ULTRASONOGRAPHIC ASSESSMENT

arm_group.description: WOMEN HAVE NO INFERTILITY PROBLEMS AND HAVE AT LEAST ONE CHILD
WOMEN WITH INFERTILITY PROBLEMS,NO HISTORY OF PREGNANCY AND HAVE NO CHILDREN

biospec_descr.textblock: SERUM SAMPLES OF PATIENTS WILL BE STORED .THE SERUM SAMPLES DO NOT CONTAIN DNA.

study_pop.textblock: ALL STUDY PARTICIPANTS SHOULD BE LESS THAN 35 YEARS OLD, MARRIED , SHOULD HAVE REGULAR MENSES AND SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST A YEAR OF UNPROTECTED SEX.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- LESS THAN 35 YEARS OLD,
- MARRIED WOMEN
- SHOULD HAVE REGULAR MENSES
- SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST A YEAR OF UNPROTECTED SEX.
Exclusion Criteria:
- HAVING ANY SYSTEMIC DISEASE.
- LONG HISTORY OF ANY DRUG USAGE.

overall_official.affiliation: KARADENIZ TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY -MEDICAL FACULTY OBSTRETICS AND GYNAECOLOGY DEPARTMENT
